trans-unit.source: Your installation contains executable script files that simplify invoking the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools. On UNIX systems, these files might need to have their default protections set to include execute privilege.

seg-source.mrk: Your installation contains executable script files that simplify invoking the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools.
On UNIX systems, these files might need to have their default protections set to include execute privilege.

target.mrk: Your installation contains executable script files that simplify invoking the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools.
On UNIX systems, these files might need to have their default protections set to include execute privilege.

trans-unit.source: A typical way to do this is with the command chmod +x *.ksh.

seg-source.mrk: A typical way to do this is with the command chmod +x *.ksh.

target.mrk: A typical way to do this is with the command chmod +x *.ksh.

trans-unit.source: Consult the documentation for your operating system for system-specific details.

seg-source.mrk: Consult the documentation for your operating system for system-specific details.

target.mrk: Consult the documentation for your operating system for system-specific details.
